Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app

Contains all the Activity basis classes, an Android Application class, and some classes useful to activities.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActivityController.EscapeToRedirector Deprecated
    now use the ActivityController.EscapeToRedirectorAnnotation annotation instead
    ActivityController.ExceptionHandler
    Defines and splits the handling of various exceptions in a single place.
    ActivityController.Interceptor
    An interface which is queried during the various life cycle events of a LifeCycle.
    ActivityController.Redirector
    An interface which is requested when a new Activity is bound to be started.
    ActivityController.SystemServiceProvider
    An interface responsible for providing Android system services, given their name.
    AppPublics.BroadcastListener
    This interface is a wrapper around a regular Android native BroadcastReceiver, by capturing the Context.registerReceiver(android.content.BroadcastReceiver, IntentFilter) invocation and implementation is one place.
    AppPublics.BroadcastListenerProvider
    States that the Android Activity or Fragment entity which implements this interface is able to provide a single AppPublics.BroadcastListener.
    AppPublics.BroadcastListenersProvider
    States that the Android Activity or Fragment entity which implements this interface is able to provide several AppPublics.BroadcastListener.
    AppPublics.LifeCyclePublic
    Because an Android Activity/Fragment entity can be destroyed and then recreated, following a configuration change (a screen orientation change, for instance), this interface gives information about an entity life cycle.
    AppPublics.MultiSelectionHandler.OnMultiSelectionChanged<BusinessObjectClass>
    The interface which is invoked by the AppPublics.MultiSelectionHandler when a new selection event occurs.
    AppPublics.SendLoadingIntent Deprecated
    use AppPublics.SendLoadingIntentAnnotation instead
    Smartable<AggregateClass>
    All activities and fragments entities of the framework must at least implement this composite interface.
    SmartableActivity<AggregateClass>
    All activities of the framework must at least implement this interface.
    SmartCommands.GuardedHandler
    Defines a single contract which enables to turn an exception into another one.
    Smarted<AggregateClass>
    Defines some common methods for all Activity and Fragment entities defined in the framework.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSmartListActivity<AggregateClass,BusinessObjectClass,ListViewClass extends android.view.ViewGroup,ViewClass extends android.view.View> Deprecated
    AbstractWrappedSmartListActivity<AggregateClass,ListViewClass extends android.view.ViewGroup> Deprecated
    ActivityController
    Is responsible for intercepting an activity starting and redirect it to a prerequisite one if necessary, and for handling globally exceptions.
    ActivityController.IssueAnalyzer
    Responsible for analyzing issues resulting from Throwable entities.
    ActivityController.IssueAnalyzer.IssueContext  
    AppPublics
    Gathers some interfaces and helpers for the types belonging to its Java package.
    AppPublics.ComponentBroadcastListener
    A broadcast listener which listens only to AppPublics.UI_LOAD_ACTION intents.
    AppPublics.LoadingBroadcastListener
    A broadcast listener which only watch after AppPublics.UI_LOAD_ACTION UI loading intents action.
    AppPublics.MultiSelectionHandler<BusinessObjectClass extends java.io.Serializable>
    A helper which receives multi-selection intents with an action set to AppPublics.MultiSelectionHandler.SELECTION_ACTION, and which remembers and triggers event according to the current selection.
    AppPublics.ReloadBroadcastListener
    A broadcast listener which only watch after AppPublics#LOAD_ACTION loading intent actions.
    Droid4mizer<AggregateClass,ComponentClass>
    The class that should be used when extending a legacy class to support the whole droid4me framework features.
    ExceptionHandlers
    A wrapper class which holds ActivityController.ExceptionHandler implementations.
    ExceptionHandlers.AbstractExceptionHandler
    A simple implementation of ExceptionHandlers.ExceptionHandler which pops-up error dialog boxes and toasts.
    ExceptionHandlers.DefaultExceptionHandler
    A extension implementation, which proposes to send an issue by e-mail.
    ForBusinessObjectActivity<AggregateClass,BusinessObjectClass>
    An activity which handles the persistence properly, which proposes a framework regarding the custom action, and which provides a framework regarding the activity life cycle.
    ProgressHandler
    Provides a way to handle progress in an application, while it is computed something and the end-user is prompted to wait until a task completion.
    ProgressHandler.ProgressExtra
    A structure which encapsulates extra completion and textual message information related to a progression event.
    SmartActionBarActivity<AggregateClass>  
    SmartActivity<AggregateClass>
    The basis class for all activities available in the framework.
    SmartApplication
    An abstract to be implemented when using the framework, because it initializes some of the components, and eases the development.
    SmartApplication.I18N
    Contains various attributes in order to have the default dialog boxes related to exceptions i18ned.
    SmartCommands
    A container which encloses various types which enable to run commands in a detached thread.
    SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand<ContextClass extends android.content.Context>
    A handy SmartCommands.GuardedCommand which will issue systematically a log when an exception occurs during the command execution, and will trigger a SmartCommands.GuardedException which wraps the original exception in that case.
    SmartCommands.DialogGuardedCommand
    A handy SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommand which will issue systematically dismiss a Dialog once the command execution is over.
    SmartCommands.GuardedCommand<ContextClass extends android.content.Context>
    A Runnable used as command, which is allowed to throw an exception during its execution.
    SmartCommands.GuardedDialogInterfaceClickListener
    A DialogInterface.OnClickListener which runs its execution in the low-priority threads pool, and which handles exceptions.
    SmartCommands.GuardedViewClickListener
    A View.OnClickListener which runs its execution in the low-priority threads pool, and which handles exceptions.
    SmartCommands.ProgressGuardedCommand
    Enables to execute in background a task, by notifying when the execution is running.
    SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommand
    A handy SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand dedicated to activities.
    SmartCommands.SmartThreadPoolExecutor
    Introduced so as to be able to catch the exceptions thrown in the framework thread pools.
    SmartDialogFragment<AggregateClass>
    A basis classes for designing a DialogFragment compatible with the framework, i.e. droid4me-ready.
    SmartFragment<AggregrateClass>
    A basis classes for designing a Fragment compatible with the framework, i.e. droid4me-ready.
    SmartGroupActivity<AggregateClass>
    A basis class for an activity that contains other activities.
    SmartGroupActivity.Rotate3dAnimation
    This is taken from the Android API Demos source code!
    SmartIntentService
    A IntentService with the logging feature.
    SmartListActivity<AggregateClass,BusinessObjectClass,ViewClass extends android.view.View> Deprecated
    SmartListViewFragment<AggregateClass,ListViewClass extends android.view.ViewGroup> Deprecated
    SmartMapActivity<AggregateClass>
    A basis class for an activity that holds a map.
    SmartPreferenceActivity<AggregateClass>
    Makes the Android PreferenceActivity compatible with the framework.
    SmartPreferenceFragment<AggregateClass>
    A basis classes for designing a PreferenceFragment compatible with the framework, i.e. droid4me-ready.
    SmartSplashScreenActivity<AggregateClass,BusinessObjectClass>
    A basis activity class which is displayed while the application is loading.
    SmartTabActivity<AggregateClass> Deprecated
    WrappedSmartListActivity<AggregateClass>
    An instantiation of the AbstractWrappedSmartListActivity bound to the native ListView.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ActivityController.Interceptor.InterceptorEvent
    Defines all the events handled by the ActivityController.Interceptor.
    ExceptionHandlers.AbstractExceptionHandler.ConnectivityUIExperience
    Defines how the framework should behave when an Internet connectivity problem has been detected.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SmartCommands.GuardedException
    An exception which acts as an Throwable wrapper, and which works in combination with the SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommand.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ActivityController.EscapeToRedirectorAnnotation
    An annotation which offers the same effect as the ActivityController.EscapeToRedirector interface.
    AppPublics.SendLoadingIntentAnnotation
    Same concept as AppPublics.SendLoadingIntent, but through an annotation.
    AppPublics.UseNativeBroadcast
    When applied to the AppPublics.BroadcastListener.getIntentFilter() method, the implementation used will be the native Context.sendBroadcast(Intent) method will be used, instead of the LocalBroadcastManager.sendBroadcast(Intent).

Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app Description

Contains all the Activity basis classes, an Android Application class, and some classes useful to activities.
